name: ElasticMapReduceStepHadoopJarStepConfigKeyValue
description: KeyValue is a property of the Amazon Elastic MapReduce Step HadoopJarStepConfig property that specifies key-value pairs, which are passed to a JAR file that Amazon Elastic MapReduce (Amazon EMR) executes.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The unique identifier of a key-value pair.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value part of the identified key.
